remarks: Every solution of the equation ` A * X = Y ` for a matrix ` A ` and a vector ` B ` is a vector.  (Contributed by AV, 27-Feb-2019.)
statement:
mavmuldm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
mavmuldm.c $e |- C = ( B ^m ( M X. N ) ) $.
mavmuldm.d $e |- D = ( B ^m N ) $.
mavmuldm.t $e |- .x. = ( R maVecMul <. M , N >. ) $.
mavmulsolcl.e $e |- E = ( B ^m M ) $.
mavmulsolcl $p |- ( ( ( M e. Fin /\ N e. Fin /\ M =/= (/) ) /\ ( R e. V /\ Y e. E ) ) -> ( ( A .x. X ) = Y -> X e. D ) ) $.
